verses.name: Jeremiah 31:14
verses.text: And I will satiate the soul of the priests with fatness, and my people shall be satisfied with my goodness, saith the Lord.

verses.name: Jeremiah 31:15
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord; A voice was heard in Ramah, lamentation, and bitter weeping; Rahel weeping for her children refused to be comforted for her children, because they were not.

verses.name: Jeremiah 31:16
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord; Refrain thy voice from weeping, and thine eyes from tears: for thy work shall be rewarded, saith the Lord; and they shall come again from the land of the enemy.
